title: The Best Days and the Best Nights in the Year - Dr Zakir Naik
transcript: the scholars differ some Scholars few do say that the first 10 days of Z are better than the last 10 nights of Ramadan there are few Scholars who say the last 10 nights are better than the first 10 days of Z but the right opinion and the correct opinion is by Islam may Allah have mercy on him and he rightly said that the first 10 days of zah are the best days in the full year it is even better than the last 10 days of Ramadan but the last 10 nights of Ramadan they are the best nights in the full year because it has the it's the best night in the full year so the last 10 nights of Ramadan are the best nights because it are and amongst the days in the full year the first 10 days of are the best days in the year because it has the Y the day of araa
